title: BTCGalaxyA12
author: BTCGalaxyA12
content: Mycelium is a Bitcoin Wallet that can receive and send other coins like Ethereum.This Bitcoin wallet is in my opinion a good wallet and worth recommending.Today, I got a notification that there is an update on this wallet.I visited the Play Store application on the Android smartphone, there was no update. What I see is that the last update was on 12 Feb 2023 regarding bug fixes.The following shows the update notification.Did any of you get the same notification?

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: Did not get the notification.3.13.0.16 is the latest version. What are you on?3 dots in upper right -> settings -> about.Check for update gives me I am on the latest version with the .16Could be a scam, could be you are on an older version that is not updating for some reason.-Dave

comments.author: BTCGalaxyA12
comments.body: Quote from: DaveF on April 19, 2023, 03:51:45 PMDid not get the notification.3.13.0.16 is the latest version. What are you on?3 dots in upper right -> settings -> about.Check for update gives me I am on the latest version with the .16I have checked it and my mycelium wallet is also version 3.16.0.16 (3160016).Quote from: DaveF on April 19, 2023, 03:51:45 PMCould be a scam, could be you are on an older version that is not updating for some reason.-DaveIs it possible scam?If there is a certain reason, it can be understood and I have to be careful.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Same here I receive the same notification with some ads promoting casinos and  gift cardsMy current version of Mycelium is 3.16.0.15 maybe the older version won't be able to receive the same notification.The latest version is 3.16.0.16 but when updating there is two option direct download from the Mycelium website or download the wallet on Playstore. I tried the Playstore but it doesn't have the new update yet.So maybe the direct download from Mycelium is the latest version?

comments.author: BTCGalaxyA12
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on April 19, 2023, 04:09:45 PMSame here I receive the same notification with some ads promoting casinos and  gift cardsMy current version of Mycelium is 3.16.0.15 maybe the older version won't be able to receive the same notification.The latest version is 3.16.0.16 but when updating there is two option direct download from the Mycelium website or download the wallet on Playstore. I tried the Playstore but it doesn't have the new update yet.So maybe the direct download from Mycelium is the latest version?It seems reasonable.Because I download the Mycelium Wallet application from their site.I got the notice directly from the Media Flow Mycelium Wallet.https://media.mycelium.com/2023/04/18/update-mycelium-wallet-to-adjust-your-etherc-20-balance/Before I opened the notification message, I immediately opened the Play Store but was not asked to update at all.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: BTCGalaxyA12 on April 19, 2023, 04:20:10 PMIt seems reasonable.Because I download the Mycelium Wallet application from their site.I got the notice directly from the Media Flow Mycelium Wallet.https://media.mycelium.com/2023/04/18/update-mycelium-wallet-to-adjust-your-etherc-20-balance/Before I opened the notification message, I immediately opened the Play Store but was not asked to update at all.What do you mean did you download the Mycelium from their site first? And receive a notification? And then you check the Playstore if there is actually a new update?I downloaded the Mycelium just now directly from their website after installing it my Mycelium upgraded to 3.16.0.16 so the latest app is currently on their direct link not yet been on playstore I guess it has still under review by Playstore for 7 days since Mycelium is under finance category.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.created_time: April 19, 2023, 11:55:13 PMLast edit: July 19, 2023, 08:17:07 PM by logfiles
comments.body: Mycelium sort of went on a downhill for me when they started advertising scam casinos like 1xbit and scam tokens on their app with referral links. Even when they were alerted, the developers just chose to ignore and instead chose to advertise scam for money.You should probably look for a better wallet.Quote from: BitMaxz on April 19, 2023, 04:52:38 PMI downloaded the Mycelium just now directly from their website after installing it my Mycelium upgraded to 3.16.0.16 so the latest app is currently on their direct link not yet been on playstore I guess it has still under review by Playstore for 7 days since Mycelium is under finance category.The latest version on the Playstore is 3.16.0.16 and the last update was in Feb

comments.author: BTCGalaxyA12
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on April 19, 2023, 04:52:38 PMQuote from: BTCGalaxyA12 on April 19, 2023, 04:20:10 PMIt seems reasonable.Because I download the Mycelium Wallet application from their site.I got the notice directly from the Media Flow Mycelium Wallet.https://media.mycelium.com/2023/04/18/update-mycelium-wallet-to-adjust-your-etherc-20-balance/Before I opened the notification message, I immediately opened the Play Store but was not asked to update at all.What do you mean did you download the Mycelium from their site first? And receive a notification? And then you check the Playstore if there is actually a new update?I downloaded the Mycelium application from their official website long before the notification appeared and I made this topic. That's what I mean.It is possible that I allow the Mycelium application to send a notification and through the media flow function every information is sent automatically.

comments.author: aylabadia05
comments.body: Quote from: BTCGalaxyA12 on April 24, 2023, 04:18:34 PMQuote from: BitMaxz on April 19, 2023, 04:52:38 PMWhat do you mean did you download the Mycelium from their site first? And receive a notification? And then you check the Playstore if there is actually a new update?It is possible that I allow the Mycelium application to send a notification and through the media flow function every information is sent automatically.In order not to confuse other people, you better pay attention first what makes the difference in the wallet.Mycelium always provides information via media flow and in your case, you turn on the notification button which makes you receive information at any time from them.Turn off Media Flow and you will no longer receive information by way of please go to settings -> personalization -> notifications.If you want to turn on in settings -> Mycelium service.
